value.title: Prediction of the functional impact of missense variants in BRCA1 and BRCA2 with BRCA-ML
value.excerpt: In silico predictions of missense variants is an important consideration when interpreting variants of uncertain significance (VUS) in the BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes.
